org.devgateway.toolkit.persistence.excel

Interface ExcelSheet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExcelSheet, AbstractExcelSheetTest.MockExcelSheet, ExcelSheetDefault

    public interface ExcelSheet
    Create an Excel Sheet representation of an Object of type T. In this process it's possible to create a new Excel Sheet if some fields are annotated with = true
    Since:
    13/11/2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emptySheet()
      Just create an empty excel sheet.
      java.lang.String getExcelSheetName()
      Returns the Sheet name.
      void writeCell(java.lang.Object value, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row row, int column)
      Write the value into specified Row and column number.
      void writeRow(java.lang.Class clazz, java.lang.Object object, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row row, java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
      Write the object into specified Row.
      void writeSheet(java.lang.Class clazz, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects, java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
      Write the received list of objects into an excel sheet.
      int writeSheetGetLink(java.lang.Class clazz, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects, java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
      Write the objects and return the first row index.

        void writeRow(java.lang.Class clazz,
              java.lang.Object object,
              org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row row,
              java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
        Write the object into specified Row. We need to also know the Class of the Object since we will export null objects as well but with empty cells.

      • writeSheet

        void writeSheet(java.lang.Class clazz,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects,
                java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
        Write the received list of objects into an excel sheet. We need to also know the Class of the Object(s) since we will export null objects as well but with empty cells.
        Parameters:
        clazz -
        objects -

      • writeSheetGetLink

        int writeSheetGetLink(java.lang.Class clazz,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects,
                      java.lang.String parentFeatureName)
        Write the objects and return the first row index. Used to (possible) create a document link between sheets.

      • getExcelSheetName

        java.lang.String getExcelSheetName()
        Returns the Sheet name.
